name: Attack on monsters
description:
this is a demo of the game not the full one , once you contact me and decide to buy the license i will provide you with the full game of course with updateble contents in the future .
the game is a typical platformer , avoid falling and avoid getting hit by monsters and other objects that can damage you , fellow the track until the end , as simple as this .
the game works with desktop computers, using the keyboard or mobile devices using touch screens.
in case the game is too hard , i can make it easier and less challenging , i will modify the game to the costumer's need wither the costumer wants it to be harder or easier , longer or shorter levels  contact me on alabeed.e@lttnet.net.
